entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He has forgotten about the inert figures he left behind and is worried about Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a character who is with Harry. She tells him that none of them are dead, but there is something in her voice that suggests otherwise.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as someone who stepped over a body, which is revealed to be Bill.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is a character who was attacked by Greyback and left in a 'bit of a mess'. He won't look the same anymore.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is a werewolf who attacked Bill.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a character who is taking care of the injured characters. She thinks Neville will make a full recovery and Professor Flitwick is just shaken up.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a character who was knocked out but is expected to recover fully.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is a character who was knocked out but is all right, just shaken up.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Ginny's tone and what it might mean.
Malfoy stepped over Bill's body, indicating that he was involved in the attack.
Madam Pomfrey is treating Neville's injury.
Madam Pomfrey is also taking care of Professor Flitwick, who was knocked out.
